```{r}
 # Load the data
data(iris)
iris <- iris[, c(1, 3, 5)]
 # Scaling the data as it must be the same variance/ standard deviation to run clustering of anykind
iris[ ,1] <- scale(iris[, 1])
iris[ ,2] <- scale(iris[, 2])
apply(iris[, c(1, 2)], 2, sd)
```

```{r}
 # Calculate the distance matrix
dist_matrix <- dist(iris[ , c(1, 2)])
```
